QuestData.Title: No Reason to Stay
QuestData.Description: Elisande's purge of the Waning Crescent came so swiftly that few could react. Many of my people are dead or taken.$b$bSome may have endured this atrocity. We need to make sure they are not left behind.$b$bI need you to search the houses nearby for any survivors. See that they flee before they are discovered. Reassure them that there is no reason to stay. $b$bNot here, not while Elisande's insanity reigns.
QuestData.LogDescription: Evacuate survivors in the Waning Crescent and Siren's Vigil.
QuestData.RewardText: I see you managed to find some survivors. Good, that is a weight off my mind.
